column4: I installed Ubuntu but was stuck with a refresh rate of 60hz no matter what, I know my monitor can do up to 85hz in high-res in windows... however I cannot find my V/H Syncs which Xorg asks for... does anyone know if there is a way to find this information in windows? - And would the same h/v sync values be reliable in Linux?
Because I love Ubuntu... but I cannot stand 60hz :(
It's playing with your xorg.conf. Just copy the resolutions and change the Hz to the desired one.
If there's not a GUI to do it with.
